title: My account is lost
body:
Lost my account from long time ago, i wrote messages to Riot, with all the information i remember. Apparently they keep giving me info, and password reset to different accounts, that i also own, but its not the right one... its the 3 time i try and i am completely lost, on what to do.
What do i have to do?
Can anyone in here help me?

replies.body: First off, why do you have multiple accounts? There's no need for that.

We can't help with account recoveries here on the boards because they require a lot of sensitive information to complete. Often recoveries can be tough if you own multiple accounts and get some information mixed up.

I recommend you continue to work with an account specialist in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Let me know if you have any other questions.
